name: Dots Clone
description:
A Dots clone made by Josh Finkel and May Li in Spring 2021 for our Intermediate  Game Development class at NYU using Unity 2019.4.18f1.  

Josh worked as the artist, animator, project manager, and programmer; and  May worked as the sound designer, UI designer, game mode designer, and programmer.  The development of this game would not have been possible without immense help from our TA, Jordan Grayson.

To play, click the left mouse button and drag your mouse to make lines and connect dots of the same color. Release the mouse button to destroy the connected dots. When in doubt, make squares.

Click the retry arrow button to restart the level, or the back arrow button to return to the main menu.

The game's background music is "Dusty Dots" by Upright T-Rex.

Other sound effects are provided by the NYU Game Center.
